issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
KitchenSink: Geolocation: error popup appears for reverse geoencoding, even if reverse geo location is updated

Steps to reproduce:
1. Click KitchenSink -> phone -> Geolocation

Expected:
All fields are updated accordingly

Actual:
All fields are updated, but error popups as "Error reverse geoencoding".
Screenshot is attached.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Geolocation: error popup appears for reverse geoencoding, even if reverse geo location is updated
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Device : iPhone 5s , iOS version : 7.1
SDK: 3.2.2.v20140214120903
CLI version : 3.2.1
OS : MAC OSX 10.9
Alloy:  1.3.1
ACS: 1.0.12
npm:1.3.2
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.1.201402061120
titanium-code-processor: 1.1.0
XCode : 5.1 Beta 5

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
